Edges-Monk -- Female Human Heroic Monk
Attributes (12 Points):
Agility: d12 Smarts: d4 Spirit: d12 Strength: d6 Vigor: d10
Attribute Notes:
Adaptability: +1 Attribute Points
Armor Restriction: -4 Agility w/any armor or shield
Skills (18 Points):
Athletics: (agi) d6 Notice: (sma) d4 Riding: (agi) d4
Boating: (agi) d4 Occult: (sma) d4 Spellcasting: (sma) d4
Common Knowledge: (sma) d4 Persuasion: (spi) d4 Stealth: (agi) d4
Fighting: (agi) d12 Repair: (sma) d8 Thievery: (agi) d6
Languages: Abyssal; Aklo; Common
Skill Notes:
Armor Restriction: -4 Agility-based skills w/any armor or shield
Danger Sense: +2 Notice (surprise)/Rolls Notice-2 in circumstances not normally subject to Notice
Size: 0 Deity: Sarenrae
Advances: 12 Improvement Points: 28 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 12; Edge: 10; Skill: 6
Features
Edges (7 points): Danger Sense; Elan; Fleet-Footed; Great Ki; Monk; Mystic Powers (Monk); Wholeness Of Body Hindrances: Cautious; Driven; Illiterate; Suspicious Human Features: Adaptability
Feature Notes:
Adaptability: +1 Edge Points
Monk: Has Armor Restriction, Martial Discipline, Mobility, Stunning Fist, and Unarmed Strike features
Cautious: Requires detailed plan before acting
Driven: Decisions are affected by personal goal
Elan: +2 on Benny-purchased trait rerolls
Illiterate: Cannot read or write
Suspicious: Trusts no one
Combat
Parry: 8 (0) Cover: 0 Toughness: 8 (0) Pace/Run: 8/+d10
Armor: None Shield: None Weapons: Dagger (d6+d4 R3"); Light Repeating Crossbow (2d6 R10"); Short Sword (d6+d6); Unarmed (+1 d6+d4)
Combat Notes:
Fighting Parry Modifier: +6 Parry
Fleet-Footed: +2 Pace/+1 Run step
Martial Discipline: +1 Toughness in no armor
Mobility: +1 Run step
Unarmed Strike: +1 Unarmed attacks, AP +2, damage d6+d4, always considered armed
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +5
Stunning Fist: Raise on Unarmed Strike makes foe choice of Distracted or Vulnerable
Arcana
Power Points: 10
Powers:
Boost/Lower Trait: (2 PP) R8" Target gains +1 trait step (Raise +2) for 5 rd or suffers -1 trait step (Raise -2) (Spirit recovers 1 step each rd)
Deflection: (3 PP) R4" Foes suffer -2 attacks (Raise -4) on target for 5 rd
Protection: (1 PP) R4" Target gains +2 Armor (Raise +4) for 5 rd
Sloth/Speed: (2 PP) R4" Target gains dbl Pace for 5 rd or suffers half pace (Spirit ends)
Smite: (2 PP) R4" Target weapon inflicts +2 damage (Raise +4) for 5 rd
Wall Walker: (2 PP) R4" Target moves at half Pace (Raise full Pace) on vertical and inverted surfaces for 5 rd
Warrior's Gift: (4 PP) R4" Target gains combat edge effects for 5 rd
Arcana Notes:
Mystic Powers (Monk): 10 Power Points/May cast Boost Trait (Agility, Athletics, Fighting, or Stealth), Deflection, Smite, and Speed on self w/automatic success (+2 PP for raise)
Great Ki: May use Mystic Powers (Monk) to cast Boost Trait (Strength), Protection, Wall Walker, and Warrior's Gift
Wholeness Of Body: May spend 2 PP to attempt Soak roll
